data.title: Everything To Know About ‘Freaky Friday 2’—From The Release Date To The Cast
data.meta_description: Disney's sequel "Freaky Friday 2" is set to hit theaters next year. Here's what to know about the film, including which cast members will return.
data.text:
The Colemans are back! Production has started on Freaky Friday 2 — the anticipated sequel to Lindsay Lohan and Jamie Lee Curtis’ beloved 2003 Disney film. Read on for everything to know about Freaky Friday 2, from the release date to the returning and new cast.

In March, Disney officially announced that Freaky Friday 2 was in the works with Nisha Ganatra set to direct. Rumors started swirling about a potential sequel in October 2022 when Curtis mentioned on The View that she had personally “written to Disney” about making the sequel.

At the time of the announcement, Curtis shared a photo with her co-star on Instagram. “DUH! FFDEUX! @disney @disneystudios,” the actress penned in the post. While some speculated that Freaky Friday 2 might be exclusively for Disney’s streaming platform, Variety recently confirmed that’s not true.

The original Freaky Friday film, released in 2003, grossed $160 million at the worldwide box office and is beloved by fans worldwide. The movie is based on Mary Rodgers’ 1972 novel, which was adapted into a 1976 movie starring Jodie Foster and Barbara Harris. Andrew Gunn, who produced the 2003 film, is producing the sequel with former Disney executive Kristin Burr.

Discover everything to know about Freaky Friday 2, including which cast members will return and what the sequel will be about.

When Is Freaky Friday 2 Coming To Theaters?

Freaky Friday 2 will premiere in movie theaters sometime in 2025. Disney has not yet announced the sequel’s exact release date.

Who Is In The Freaky Friday 2 Cast?

Get ready to see some familiar faces in Freaky Friday 2. Alongside Lohan and Curtis, returning cast members include Mark Harmon, Chad Michael Murray, Christina Vidal Mitchell, Haley Hudson, Lucille Soong, Stephen Tobolowsky, and Rosalind Chao, all of whom were part of the original film.

Murray portrayed Anna’s high school crush, Jake, while Harmon played Ryan, Anna’s future stepdad. Vidal Mitchell and Hudson will return as Anna’s bandmates, Maddie and Peg, while Chao and Soong will reprise their roles as the owner of the Chinese restaurant and her daughter.

Meanwhile, new cast members include Julia Butters (One Upon a Time in Hollywood), Manny Jacinto (The Good Place), Maitreyi Ramakrishnan (Never Have I Ever), and Sophia Hammon (Under Wraps).

Has Freaky Friday 2 Started Filming?

Yes! The Freaky Friday sequel officially started filming and production in June 2024. On June 24, Lohan shared an Instagram video of her and Curtis posing for photographs outside their trailers along with the caption,” We’re back!☺️”

What Will Freaky Friday 2 Be About?

Disney revealed some plot details about the anticipated sequel. Freaky Friday 2 "picks up years after Tess (Curtis) and Anna (Lohan) endured an identity crisis. Anna now has a daughter of her own and a soon-to-be stepdaughter. As they navigate the myriad challenges that come when two families merge, Tess and Anna discover that lightning might indeed strike twice," according to the synopsis.

Stay tuned to learn more about Freaky Friday 2.
